methodology_notes.trust_score: Weighted average of verification completeness, audit findings, and compliance coverage
methodology_notes.community_wealth: Economic Value of Volunteerism + Circular Resource Value + Social Impact Monetization

assurance_levels.Reasonable: Independent third-party verification with comprehensive testing
assurance_levels.Limited: Internal controls with external sample-based verification
assurance_levels.Developing: Self-reported with verification infrastructure under development
